topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f3ed263687208adae0100#post_552f3ed263687208adae0100
That sounds good except for the fact that A.) I'm 27 and would be arrested pretty much immediately, B.) Even if I, or any of us were the right age the one guy among 200 girls would be watched like a goddamn hawk, and C.) it would be incredibly lonely. Like sure there'd be girls you'd probably get along with as friends, but it would essentially be like being the one black kid at an otherwise all white school. Even if no one is a dick to you, you're still treated differently because the 200 girls would be weirded out by interacting with a guy their own age and with the best intentions would unintentionally exclude you.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f3ed263687208adae0100#post_552f3ed263687208adae0100
[bq="HJSDGCE"]Imagine getting sent to a school where you are the only guy among 200 girls.[/bq]
I'd probably be fine. I hang out with a lot of Girls irl. 

Fact in my old school if I wasn't talking to my Friends I was talking to girls for whatever reason. 

Though the idea of being the only dude there is pretty freaky. 

Thoooough looking back I was a shy guy, and I'm still very shy irl so who knows?

This could probably be great or end in tears!

topics.body:
I can't play Borderlands, I can't play Dead Space 2.

I only have two weeks left until I go back to college from my semester break and I'll have to be the one to clean the house, go to college full time and get a job on the weekend and I want to play something in the mean time.

My only options left are ARMA 2: not interested bought it only for dayz mod.
Cities XL. . . need I say more.
Company of Heroes; never played it and don't know anything about it.
Contagion: kickstarter that turned out to be a bad game.
I am Alive: turned out to be crap.
Rayman Origins: I have no rhythm.
Sanctum: oh my god is one of the enemies fucking annoying cause you have to snipe like thirty of them in ten seconds and the game won't let you progress beyond that point.  That level deserves all the negative reviews it gets.
Red Orchestra 2: never played it.
Everything else I've already beaten.
Only reason why I got CS: source was for garry's mod.


Only game I haven't played out of everything: Jet Set Radio future.
Options:  Jet Set Radio future but that's only a single day of gameplay.  I've already played everything else to death.
